Нуууу,начну с того,что этот аддон не такой крутой,как оригинальная халфа,но как говорил один человек:
"Синяя Смена,хоть и не идеал,но она необходима,для понимания сюжета."
Моя оценка 9/10
Underrated Half Life game. If you haven't played it you totally should.

Step into the shoes of Barney Calhoune, a Black Mesa security officer that will eventually become essential to saving the world!

This expansion to the original Half Life shows you the Resonance Cascade through the eyes of a low security clearance guard who is doing this job just to put his ass through college to get a better job. Everyone at Black Mesa is an ass to you until something needs to be fixed. Or shot. And even then, most of the people are still asses.
 This expansion introduces several new character models, and continues increasing the difficulty slider even over Opposing Force. Also, this expansion features an easter egg from the PlayStation 2 release of Half Life called Decay, where you get to see some of the aftermath of the coop scientists actions.
For the majority of the game, you will be assisting Dr. Rosenberg with activating a teleportation system in the old run down area of Black Mesa. You will go to Xen and back. But this time around, the Xen sections aren't tedious.
The ending to this mod comes very fast, as it only took me 3 hours to complete, but this expansion is not filled with hours of tedious corridor crawling. You shoot bad humans and aliens quite a bit in the short campaign, but there are also some great puzzles followed with tense combat.

Controls, graphics, sound, and overall style of action doesn't differ from Opposing Force or Half Life. So all of the pros and cons from those 2 games carry over here.

If you want to see a young Dr. Rosenberg with his MANLY MAN voice, play this.

8/10 because MEN MEN MEN MEN MANLY MEN do science things.

Although this game has its bugs and is pretty short compared to other installments in the series, this game was actually really well done for what it was trying to be: just a small additional mission pack that builds up to half life 2. [spoiler] This game is basically like that chapter in the original half life where you see the human grunts for the first time and have to get into that security room that is in the beggining of the chapter. In blue shift you find a group of scientists, who unlike in half life, do not care about killing the all mighty being in the xen dimension, they only care about escaping. You go around fixing this teleporter so everyone in your group can get out and live hapily ever after. [/spoiler] This means that you return to the same area a lot instead of going through linear one stop shop levels like in every other installment of the series, which is a really cool design! the $5 price tag is definantly worth it, or better yet just buy the half life series on sale so you can experience the whole game,

So my review for this. First of all, the game runs almost paralel to the hf / hf opposing force. However there is not much relation to the main characters of hf and hf op.force. The game is too short. First walkthrough in less than 3 hours, second walkthrough less than 1 hour. However it's fun since it is similar to the previous games. Only worth to buy it as a package or discounted.

Half life blue shift es buen juego para una expansion de half life y volvemos de nuevo a estar en black mesa pero ahora controlamos al amigo de Gordon freeman, barney caldhoun que es un guardia de seguridad.
Este juego lamentablemente no está en español y son los mismos enemigos pero a diferencia es que tiene a un nuevo personaje llamado doctor Rosenberg y nos da otra perspectiva de lo que paso en black mesa así añadiendo más historia al universo de half life.
Recomendado :)
This really feels more like a mod than an official half-life game, but its still pretty good.

[b]El juego nos convierte en Barney Calhoun, uno de los muchos guardias de seguridad de Black Mesa, quien vive al mismo tiempo que Gordon Freeman el incidente de Black Mesa, pero en otros momentos y lugares... Como ven no seremos héroes encarnando a Freeman ni villanos siendo Shepard, sino que estaremos en el punto medio .Argumentalmente me parece mejor que Opposing Force y al ver que sucede en la misma linea del tiempo que el titulo original me encanta mas, en todo apartado es igual al original... Lo que cambian son las armas con las que enfrentaremos a los Xenianos y Soldados. Abra ciertos "puzzles" por decirlo de alguna manera en los que deberemos pensar un poco para pasarlos (nada del otro mundo, pero suma). ¡En resumen esta expansión cumple y con creces siendo totalmente recomendable para cualquier jugador[/b]

Está buena esta expansión, eso sí... no le llega ni a los talones al Opposing Force en cuanto a contenido nuevo, y ni hablar de la calidad del primer titulo, aun así te vas a encontrar con un juego de notable 7 u 8.
Its some nice backstory and setup for half life 2.

Пока Гордон Фримэн опаздывает на важнейший в своей жизни эксперимент, охранник комплекса Барни Галхун решает повседневные проблемы. Выяснить, почему не открывается дверь в служебном туннеле монорельса, сопроводить ученых и т.д. Внезапно, все катиться к чертям, и охраннику приходится применять свои навыки по делу.
Пробившись через заполонивших комплекс зомби, представителей инопланетной фауны и разумных захватчиков из другого измерения, Барни с небольшой группкой ученых уезжает из комплекса. Пока что, его роль в этой истории заканчивается. Но, персонаж будет иметь гораздо большее влияние на события сиквела в будущем.
Само дополнение планировалось как небольшая добавка для порта Half-Life на Sega Dreamcast. Порт отменили, но Valve и Gearbox решили не выбрасывать готовый материал в помойку. Продолжительность и количество нововведений, конечно, уступают предыдущему дополнению, но играется довольно бодро.
В кооперативном прохождении через SVEN-Coop наблюдаются проблемы с подгрузкой карт, подразумевающей изменение на пройденной локации при  возвращении. Лечится пока выбором следующей карты. В остальном играется нормально.

Half life Blue Shift: Dar catedra de como hacer expansiones como la gente. Fresca a su manera, marcando la diferencia con Opposing Force (que hacia mas foco en el combate y en la variedad de armas y arsenal que agrandaban respecto al juego original), aca tenemos un HL mas oscuro y solitario, sin tantas armas y de hecho, hasta reduciendo el arsenal del juego base, pero que de ninguna manera representa algo negativo, pues Blue Shift tiene su propio aire y carisma basado en la soledad, oscuridad, y hasta narrativa e interaccion con otros PNG que antes no habia.

 Blue Shift es corto, pero alarga la propuesta del juego base añadiendo elementos frescos, y no refritando. Recomendado. Ademas, es ultra barato hasta en relacion a lo cortito que es (entre 2 y 4 horas dependiendo de tu habilidad)

Muy corto, me lo he pasado en 2 horas y algo. Pero conecta muy bien con Half Life 1 y tiene mucha dificultad. 
Por decir algo negativo es que el juego no tiene logros.
it's okay, still recommend op4 or hl1 over this though

[h1] Half-Life: Blue Shift [/h1]

[b] A Pretty Pointless Addition To The Half-Life Series [/b]

There isn't much to say about this title. A second expansion to the brilliant [b] Half-Life [/b], the focus of this game isn't on Gordan Freeman or even a special ops member in Adrian Shepard - you play as lowly security officer Barney Calhoun. Fans of [b] Half-Life 2 [/b] may be excited, but little is developed about the character of Barney throughout this title. Really, nothing is added to the gameplay in the three years between the original game's release ([b]1998[/b]) and this mediocre journey through the day of Barney during the Black Mesa incident ([b]2001[/b]). The shooting is the same, the enemies are pretty much the same, but the story is lesser than the original due to lacking the same impact. It is less of an "expansion" and more of a set of bonus levels. If you were craving more of the same, with slightly better textures but no addition to combat, story, or character development, go ahead and try this title. Otherwise, I would [b] Not Recommend [/b] this expansion, as the original game should suit you just fine without feeling like a waste of time. It's not awful, just unnecessary.

[h2] Final Verdict: 4/10 (Below Average) [/h2]

If you enjoyed this review, feel free to check out my curator page for my thoughts on a variety of other games!

https://store.steampowered.com/curator/37542043-ADHD-Reviews/

Want a painfully short romp through the Half-Life world where the only characters are copy-pasted and uninteresting scientists. Well if so this is the game for you. If you just wanna play another fps, this’ll certainly fill that gap in your life. Not worth $10, if you are going to get this, at least treat yourself to the Valve collection to get other better games too.

A pesar de ser una historia más corta se siente mejor ejecutada, pues tenemos bien claro el objetivo desde el comienzo, hay que sumarle que se ve aprecia de una mejor forma la destrucción de Black Mesa y al igual que su otra expansión, tenemos cruces de las otras obras.

Mecánicamente no agrega mucho salvo por las nuevas armas que podemos usar, aún así mantiene las características de pequeños puzzles que caracterizan la saga.

Зато количество камео монтировочника увеличилось в несколько раз по сравнению с Opposing Force. Эм, ура?

It is a really good expansion but i guess most people were disappointed a little at it for being kinda small, which is reasonable.
I absolutely adore it just like [url=store.steampowered.com/app/50/HalfLife_Opposing_Force] Opposing Force [/url] and it's something that i'll always come back to play when the time is right.
But of course i got my minor complaints like how the Security Guard Traning was just a lazily copy from the original Hazard Course or the slightly annoying music problem when loading another map (which was fixed in Half-Life a long time ago for the Steam release but never fixed for Opposing Force and Blue Shift)
Anyway i do really recommend it alongside Opposing Force and Decay if you wanna expand your Half-Life experience.

Синяя смена, в отличии от Противостоящей Силы, - это два шага назад и необязательный к прохождению эпизод. Почти всю игру бьем солдафонов, иногда закусывая вортигонтами, а когда не деремся - решаем изъебистые головоломОчки. Нет новых противников, а арсенал меньше, чем в оригинале. Бои показались непродуманными и скучными. Хоть раза в 2 короче, чем Opposing Force.
